channel.title: NYS:AGCO on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:AGCO on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Tractor Makers Warn That Tariffs Will Raise Machinery Prices for Global Farmers
item.description: Farmers will soon start feeling the impact from President Donald Trump’s tariffs in the form of higher prices for the machines used to plant, treat and harvest fields.
